descriptors.name: DoorLockKeyPad
descriptors.label: DoorLockKeyPad
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave certified Door Lock application shows a lock implementation. It will support user codes to open a door and thereby eliminate the need for traditional keys. It is possible to both lock and unlock the door remotely through the Z-Wave protocol.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: LEDBulb
descriptors.label: LEDBulb
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave certified LED Bulb application shows an implementation of a remotely controlled color switch. An example is a LED bulb or any other color capable device.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: PowerStrip
descriptors.label: PowerStrip
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave certified Power Strip application shows an extension block implementation used to turn on several devices that are connected to power. Examples include lights, appliances, etc.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: SensorPIR
descriptors.label: SensorPIR
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave certified Sensor PIR application shows a presence/movement detector implementation for controlling other devices and for sending notifications.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: SwitchOnOff
descriptors.label: SwitchOnOff
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave certified Switch On/Off application shows a switch implementation that turns on any device that is connected to power. Examples include lights, appliances, etc.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: WallController
descriptors.label: WallController
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave certified Wall Controller application shows a push-button switch panel implementation to control devices in the Z-Wave network from push buttons (physical or virtual) on a device that is meant to be mounted on a wall. Examples include scene and zone controller and wall-mounted AV controllers.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: MultilevelSensor
descriptors.label: MultilevelSensor
descriptors.description: The Z-Wave Switch Multilevel Sensor application shows the ability to advertise numerical sensor readings, such as temperature, and humidity. Multiple parameters can be set for the minimum and maximum values, and a notification will be send if the measured temperature value is out of the range.

properties.value: brd4200a brd4202a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4207a brd4209a brd4210a com.silabs.board.none
